attributes.title: Mystery of Matrix - on Sadashiva, Hindu Cosmology, Q&A
attributes.description:
Today, September 13th, 2016, Paramahamsa Nithyananda answers questions about the 25 states of Consciousness, the 11 Dimensions and the 5 aspects of Vyakta Sadashiva. He also explains an important point:  Sadashiva will reveal all the sacred secret sciences of the Cosmos if we hold the right space. Out of anger or 
frustration, demanding answers from him will never work. We will sit in delusion for janmas. Only from the sweet 
space of Bhakti can we be in the receptive space to imbibe the sacred truths.
